body.name: Peach Slices | Snail Rescue All-in-One Oil Free Face Moisturizer | 95% Snail Mucin | Lightweight, Long-Lasting Hydration | Silicone-Free | Face Cream | Skin Care | Clean & Cruelty-Free | 2.82 oz
features: Achieve Clear, Shine-Free Glow: This refreshing, gel-texture moisturizer strikes the perfect balance. It deeply hydrates, doesn't clog pores, and provides enough lasting moisturization so that skin stays supple all day.

Snail Mucin: Our acne moisturizer for face contains 95% snail mucin concentrate and is celebrated for delivering powerful-yet-gentle results. Snail mucin naturally hydrates, exfoliates and targets dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles, while keeping your skin smooth and delivering an even glow.
Only Goodness For Your Skin: Cica calms signs of redness, birch juice helps skin look brighter and more even-toned, and strawberry extract helps achieve bouncy, polished skin.

Lightweight Formula: Our face moisturizer cream is lightweight and will not clog pores, making it especially suitable for oily and acne-prone skin. A perfect addition to your skincare routine for both men & women.
Clean Formula: Revolutionary cruelty-free clean formula is alcohol-free, sulfate-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, gluten-free, and Leaping Bunny certified.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For All Skin Types This gentle formula will not clog pores making it suitable for dry, normal, oily, sensitive, or acne-prone skin. How to Use Apply as last step of your routine before SPF. External use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool and dry place. Can be used AM and PM. Snail Mucin This antimicrobial enzyme produced by snails helps heal acne scarring including hyperpigmentation, firm, regenerate and hydrate skin. 3-Step Snail Mucin Routine This moisturizer is part of our 3-step snail mucin routine that helps transform skin so that it looks smooth and clear.

Cruelty-Free Formula Our formula contains zero alcohol, fragrance or harsh chemicals. Gluten-free. Cruelty-free and Leaping Bunny-certified. Our Promise Our Peach Slices collection is clean, effective and fun! We bring you the latest and greatest high-performance products with trendsetting, innovative formulas and textures. Play, experiment, multi-mask. Strawberry Extract This fruit extract is a potent source of vitamin C and known for its skin-brightening, sebum-balancing, and anti-inflammatory properties. Hyaluronic Acid This helps bind moisture to skin, reducing the visibility of fine lines and wrinkles and creating a plumping effect.

Snail Rescue Moisturizer Snail Rescue Wash-Off Jelly Mask Snail Rescue Toner Deep Blemish Microdarts Acne Spot Dots Dark Spot Microdarts Description This weightless moisturizer helps quench thirsty skin, zap zits, and minimize shine thanks to 95% snail mucin and cica. "Snail jelly" mask instantly refreshes and calms as it's applied onto the skin. This intensive treatment clears skin and targets dark spots, blemishes, pores, and dullness. Fast-absorbing toner is your fast track to hydrated, blemish-free skin and an even glow with 95% snail mucin and cica. Microdart patches for emerging and underground blemishes. Speedy, non-drying acne treatment patches. Microdart patches for dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Daily Acne Routine Step 1 ✓ Daily Acne Routine Step 2 ✓ Daily Acne Routine Step 3 ✓ Early Stages & Deep Pimples ✓ Active Blemishes ✓ Post Zit Redness & Dark Spots ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Harmful Chemicals ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels so nice and clean on the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product because i have really dry and sensitive skin. My first impression wasn’t the best because it came out really fast and smelled weird. But after using it for a few months I can definitely say it is worth the buy. It hydrates my skin and doesn’t burn after it’s applied. My face looks glowy and healthy after each use and it has helped the dryness so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Please bring the cleanser on amazing
reviews.reviewText: Amazing products would love to see them all on Amazon cleared up my skin so so well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I have *extremely* oily skin prone to acne and large pores. Finally I said enough is enough have changed quite a few things about my skincare routine (so I'm not 100% sure if this product by itself improved my skin or if it was the whole arsenal of products that helped me).2-3 days after I started using this cream AM and PM my skin started feeling smooth and I noticed significantly less oil on my skin at the end of the day. The cream absorbs super fast and doesn't leave any greasy film whatsoever - more like the opposite - sometimes it even feels like I didn't moisturize at all. Would 10/10 recommend it for oily sensitive skin.PS: I am also using Paula's Choice BHA exfoliator every 3 days (apply at night only), hyaluronic acid (the Ordinary) in the morning after the shower on damp skin followed by this moisturizer and sunscreen, and niacinamide (the Ordinary) in the evening followed by this moisturizer and retinol serumhope this helps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: This product is to watery , not enough moisture for me. Tried using it for a week and ended up buying something else. I am in my 50’s and need more moisture, this may work for teens. Not a bad product just not for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent light moisturizer for combination skin
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing! I have sensitive combination skin and hormonal acne, and this is my go-to moisturizer for humid summer days and those weeks where I know my skin is going to misbehave. Sometimes I use a heavier oil serum in a few places, because this is quite light, but I like that flexibility. It doesn’t react with either adapalene or clindamycin/benzoyl peroxide acne treatments, so I can use them together without problems. And being cruelty-free is mandatory!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. My daughter asked me to try and the name and what it was made of put me off, but I tried it anyway. I have very dry skin and being a diabetic very wary of what creams I use. This cream made my skin feel very soft and silky. After only a couple of uses on my arms and legs, I felt that I did see a difference. I highly recommend.
